issue.title: Indication when all ignition processes are launched

content.raw: I’m having a fly away behavior that I think is related to this.  If I start our controller too soon, the X4 vehicle flies vertically quickly and I have to kill all processes and start over.  I have not figured out how to reproduce this issue on demand yet, but I’ll let you know if I find a way.
content.html: I’m having a fly away behavior that I think is related to this. If I start our controller too soon, the X4 vehicle flies vertically quickly and I have to kill all processes and start over.
